code:
---
title: login package
config:
  htmlLabels: false
umlink:
  select:
  - field: package
    pattern: com.rocket.radar.login
---
classDiagram
class LoginCriteriaFragment {
  -button_back: ImageButton
  +onCreateView(inflater: LayoutInflater, container: ViewGroup, savedInstanceState: Bundle) View
}
class LoginStartScanningFragment {
  -button_continue: Button
  -TAG: String$
  -username: String
  -email: String
  -phoneNumber: String
  -deviceId: String
  -uid: String
  -profileViewModel: ProfileViewModel
  -mAuth: FirebaseAuth
  -isObserverInitialized: boolean
  +onCreateView(inflater: LayoutInflater, container: ViewGroup, savedInstanceState: Bundle) View
  -setupUI(view: View) void
  +onResume() void
  -updateOrCreateUser() void
  -saveProfile(uid: String) void
}
class LoginViewFragment {
  ~mAuth: FirebaseAuth
  -button_start_scanning: Button
  -button_criteria: Button
  +onCreateView(inflater: LayoutInflater, container: ViewGroup, savedInstanceState: Bundle) View
  +onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle) void
}
LoginCriteriaFragment --|> Fragment
LoginStartScanningFragment --|> Fragment
LoginViewFragment --|> Fragment
